author: brad.decker
content: Related: If a dependency doesn't support EIP-1559, would it make sense to use EIP-1559 estimation and then just set gasPrice based on computed maxFeePerGas, similar to how backwards compatibility of legacy transactions is achieved? Would that potentially produce a better result (*for the user*) than using legacy txs.
